# Portable Translations
#
# Instructions:
#  - Edit each [[Translation]] section below by hand.
#  - Translate what is in each preceding [[id]] section.
#  - Remove any <none> placeholder before.
#  - Use any text editor to do so.
#  - Use encoding UTF-8 whenever you are prompted to choose.
#  - Do not edit other sections.
#  - You may split long sentences with new lines.
%YAML 1.1
---
!<Translations>
language: fr
native_language: Fran√ßais
source_language: en
source_native_language: English

[[256e0d7]]

Hello, world!

[[Translation]]

Bonjour, monde!

[[2ac373a]]

Farewell, world!

[[Translation]]

Au revoir, monde!
